objectives: Students will discuss travel and tourism using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to travel and tourism
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining travel and tourism content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore travel and tourism through a Fantasy lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving travel and tourism

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to travel and tourism in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about travel and tourism using slang register
Students create original fantasy themed content about travel and tourism in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe travel and tourism in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in travel and tourism?
Can you create a Fantasy story about travel and tourism?
How does travel and tourism change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving travel and tourism
roles: Character A: Using slang register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in slang register within fantasy theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
